A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is my second favorite Star Wars behind Empire Strikes Back... I like the direction they are taking the Star Wars mythology.... I know a lot of fans wanted to see more Luke and the training of Rey\, but when we saw Luke being trained by Obi-Wan & Yoda there was not much training there. So i dont get all the complaining. The movie like all movies has it flaws but they were  small. Over all it was a great movie. Will see it multiples time.
